name: MindCloset
0:
”Alexa, open mind closet”
”My glasses are on desk”
”where are my glasses”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mind closet
des: The skill remembers position of keys,wallet,glasses,phone when invoked by saying "open mind closet",Then tells about their position when asked about, The positions are "any preposition" followed by fridge, tv, desk, table. Ex: "Alexa, tell mind closet, my glasses are next to the tv", "Alexa, ask mind closet, Where are my glasses?" on which the response would be "Last time you told me, your glasses were next to the tv"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
